name: Helherron
description:
Helherron is an old-school freeware fantasy role playing game. You will create a party of eight heroes in an attempt to save the island of Helherron and its sister islands from the evil powers of chaos.

Helherron is currently available for the 64-bit and 32-bit Windows platforms and Mac OS X. Since version 2.105, Helherron requires OpenGL 3.3 compatible graphics drivers. If you are playing Helherron with a very old computer, please try upgrading to as new graphics driver as possible.

Check www.reddit.com/r/helherron for the latest news and Helherron discussion! And if you like the game, please consider donation. Details can be found in the readme.txt file.
